definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The kinematics theory provides a necessary basis for the application and the improvement of crosshead coupling.
sentences.chinese: 爲滑塊聯軸器的應用與改進提出了必要的理論依據。

sentences.english: Through a rigid sleeve coupling, pump shaft was connected to the motor shaft .
sentences.chinese: 通過一個剛性套筒聯軸器，泵軸被連接至電機軸上。

sentences.english: The direction of external cooling airflow shall be identical to the coupling direction.
sentences.chinese: 外部冷卻空氣流動的方向應與聯軸器方向一致。

sentences.english: How long will it take to make a coupling bolt?
sentences.chinese: 做一個聯軸器螺栓需要多長時間？

sentences.english: Discs can also be supplied to fit shaft couplings.
sentences.chinese: 盤也可以提供給適合聯軸器。

sentences.english: Pairs of gear coupling is a kind of lifting accessories.
sentences.chinese: 雙齒聯軸器是起重配件的一種。

sentences.english: Lubricated air compressor coupling, visual inspection of dry-type coupling.
sentences.chinese: 潤滑空壓機聯軸器，目視檢查干式聯軸器。

sentences.english: Lubricated air compressor coupling, visual inspection of dry-type coupling.
sentences.chinese: 潤滑空壓機聯軸器，目視檢查干式聯軸器。

sentences.english: This paper discuses reforming Water pump's latex coupling into soft connection to solve its maintenance problems.
sentences.chinese: 水泵膠塊聯軸器改成軟聯接，解決水泵的維護問題。

sentences.english: The rolling-ball coupling is a kind of new and high-efficiency drive part.
sentences.chinese: 滾珠聯軸器是一種新型高效的聯軸器。

sentences.english: The rolling-ball coupling is a kind of new and high-efficiency drive part.
sentences.chinese: 滾珠聯軸器是一種新型高效的聯軸器。

sentences.english: The shaft of pump and motor are connected with plum-shaped flexible coupling.
sentences.chinese: 泵軸與電機軸採用梅花形彈性聯軸器連接。

sentences.english: The 'OFF-SET' couplings are supplied with all bearings grease-packed, ready for operation.
sentences.chinese: 偏心聯軸器配有的所有軸承已經經過潤滑，可以使用。
